name: Ernesto Maserati
introduction: Ernesto Maserati (August 8 1898 - December 1 1975) was one of the brothers who founded Maserati in 1914. For much of the time he was the director, chief engineer and only factory driver of the team. After the company was sold to Adolpho Orsi in 1937, the brothers remained with 10 year contracts. When those expired in 1947, the brothers left to found OSCA.
